headline: Is CRH (CRH) Fairly Priced After NYSE Listing And Recent Share Price Softness
summary: If you are wondering whether CRH at around US$122.56 is offering fair value or an opportunity, the key is to line up its price against what the underlying business might reasonably be worth. The stock has seen a 1.7% decline over the last 7 days, a 3.4% decline over 30 days and a 3.1% decline year to date, while its 1 year return sits at 29.6% and its 3 and 5 year returns are both 203.9%.
